verses.text: Mamin rey, yab'ocab' Jehová ko Diosal a onh yinhtil onh winhaj Jacob a lesalwi. Aocab' tzach colani ayic ayach och t'a ilk'olal.
Yak'ocab'cot scolwal t'ayach masanto t'a stemplo t'a Sion.
Snaocab'cot masanil ofrenda ix ak'a'. Schaocab' sk'ool a silab' tza nhustz'aoc.
Aocab' ol ak'an elk'och icha a gana yet' masanil tastac nab'il uuj.
Ol el cav yuj tzalajk'olal ayic ol ak'an ganar heb' ajk'ool. Ol quik'chaanh ko bandera yuj quik'anchaanh ko Diosal. Aocab' Jehová tz'ak'an masanil tas k'anb'il uuj.
Cojtacxo ticnaik to a Jehová ol colan winh ko reyal sik'b'ilel yuj. Masanto t'a satcha’anh to anhej ay yico', ol tak'woccot t'ay. Yuj spoder Jehová chi' ol yak' ganar niwac owal winh ko reyal.
Ay heb' tz'ak'anoch scarruaje yic owal yipoc sk'ool, ay pax juntzanhxo heb', a nok' schej heb' syak'och yipoc sk'ool. Ha onhxo pax tik, a Jehová ko Diosal skak'och yipoc ko k'ool.
Ha heb' chi' spax yip yoc heb', stelwi heb', a onhxo pax tik jun, tek'tek' caji, linhannhej onh k'ei.
Mamin Jehová, col winh ko reyal. Tak'wanh t'ayonh ayic tzach cavtani.
